ValidationRule.description: If Either Portal Main POC or Partner User is changed and the two values do not match and Record Type = Pipeline Client, the following error is shown: Partner User must match Portal Main POC
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordTypeId = "012A0000000kZfw", Portal_Main_POC__c <> Partner_User__c, OR( ISCHANGED(Portal_Main_POC__c), ISCHANGED(Partner_User__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Partner User must match Portal Main POC
